title: High atomic weight, high-energy radiation (HZE) induces transcriptional responses shared with conventional stresses in addition to a core "DSB" response specific to clastogenic treatments

source_row.Title: High atomic weight, high-energy radiation (HZE) induces transcriptional responses shared with conventional stresses in addition to a core "DSB" response specific to clastogenic treatments

sections.accession_numbers:
Accession numbers
All of our microarray data has been deposited in the Gene Expression Omnibus (
http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo
) with the accession number [
GSE61484
].
The authors apologize for this oversight. This does not affect the scientific conclusions of the article in any way.
Conflict of interest statement
The authors declare that the research was conducted in the absence of any commercial or financial relationships that could be construed as a potential conflict of interest.
